name: Techno Engineering
overview:
Established in the year 1987, we, “Techno Engineering” are one of the trusted organization engaged in the manufacture and supply of Industrial chains, wheels,gears and allied products.

Our Products : The range of products offered by our organization includes Roller Chains, Bevel Gears & Helical, Worm Wheels, Variable & V-Belt Pulleys and Concrete Mixers. In addition to this, we also provide Gear & Star Couplings, Sprockets and Tower Hoists. These products are widely used in various application areas for different purposes.

Application Areas: We are none of the leading manufacturers and suppliers of Industrial chains, wheels, gears and allied products. These products are manufactured using high-grade raw-material procured from the trusted vendors. Our products are manufactured in our technically advanced infrastructure adhering to the set international standards.

Our Team: An efficient team is like the crucial cog in the wheel of our organization. We have a qualitative team of professionals engaged in fulfilling the distinct demands of our clients. These professionals are highly qualified as per their respective domain.

Quality Assurance: Being a quality oriented organization, we are highly focused towards the quality of our products at all costs. All our products are stringently quality tested under various parameters at every stage of production before final delivery ensuring the flawlessness of our range.

Client Satisfaction: Being a client-centric organization, we are highly focused towards providing a qualitative range of products to our clients. We make sure that our products are qualitatively manufactured using high-grade technology ensuring the flawless range of products to our clients. Our products are highly appreciable for for their fair pricing and high quality standards.
